filteredProjects.title: StreamMyMeal-microservices
filteredProjects.desc: Microservices-based food delivery platform that supports live streaming from restaurants while meals are being cooked, building transparency and trust. It enables users to place orders, track them, and receive real-time updates via Kafka and email notifications.

filteredProjects.title: FamilyBank-fintech-microservice
filteredProjects.desc: Microservices architecture is designed for scalability, resilience, and modularity, making it ideal for modern financial applications.
